title: Not linking with the framework OpenGLES (referenced by a module reference in SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll)
body:
I am building SkiaSharp in a .Net Maui project on Mac but am receiving this error

ILLINK : warning MT0182: Not linking with the framework OpenGLES (referenced by a module reference in SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll) because it's not available on the current platform (MacCatalyst).

I have tried adding SkiaSharp.View.Maui.Controls to the main project but it did not help.

I also created a new, blank Maui project and added a SKCanvasView to the main page, it did not give me an error like my main project, but it did give me a warning with the same message.

comments.author: drossoft
comments.body: Hi @gktval, did you find a solution?

comments.author: gktval
comments.body: No, the warning remains there. It seems to disappear and reappear frequently after rebuilding the solution. I'm not sure the rhyme or reason to it. But the app seems to work even with the warning.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I think this is because I am including the code to use Open GL - even though I don't really use it. I probably should investigate things like this where we can exclude code for platforms that don't / can't use it.

This is more an annoying side effect of too much cross platform code than a real app-affecting bug.

comments.author: drossoft
comments.body:
Ok. Thanks!

comments.author: danies8
comments.body:
Hi,

i got this eeror while building my app in mac, net 8 using maui app.

warning MT0182: Not linking with the framework OpenGLES (referenced by a module reference in SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll) because it's not available on the current platform (MacCatalyst). 

As results, i cant build and run my app.
The app work before.

comments.author: danies8
comments.body: I have reproduced the warning outside of the usage of Telerik controls. Sample maui project just added the SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls and Compatibilityreference and called .UseSkiaSharp inside the MauiProgram.cs file.

comments.author: didiyordanova
